verses.verse: I saw another great and astonishing sign in heaven, seven angels having the seven last plagues, for in them God's wrath was finished.
Next, I saw a sea of glass mixed with fire, and those who had overcome the beast and his statue, mark, and number of his name stand on the sea of glass having the harps of God.

They were singing the song of Moses, the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying, "Great and marvelous [are] your works, Lord God Almighty; just and true [are] your ways, you King of God's people.
"Who will not fear you, O Lord, and glorify your name, for only [you are] holy, for all nations will come and worship in your presence, because your judgments are plainly seen."
After that I looked, and look, the temple of the tabernacle of testimony was opened in heaven,
and seven angels came out of the temple having the seven plagues. They were dressed in pure, white linen, having their chests wrapped with a golden sash.
One of the four living creatures gave the seven angels seven gold cups full of the fierce anger of God, who lives forever and ever.
Then the temple was filled with smoke from God's glory and his power. No one was able to enter the temple until the seven plagues of the seven angels were completed.
